CreateCourses.titleDescription: It's just a working title, you can change it later.
CreateCourses.titlePlaceholder: E.g.: Learn how to program in Python from scratch
CreateCourses.descTitle: Any ideas for the course description?
CreateCourses.descDescription: If you're not sure if the description is appropriate, you can change it later.
CreateCourses.descPlaceholder: Example: In this course you will learn from the basics to the most advanced of ...
CreateCourses.categoryTitle: Which category best fits the knowledge you are going to share?
CreateCourses.categoryDescription: If you are not sure what the right category is, you can change it later.

CourseEdit.pageDescription: Your course landing page is crucial to your success. As you complete this section, think about creating a compelling Course Landing Page that demonstrates why someone would want to enroll in your course.
CourseEdit.titleHint: Your title should be a mix of attention-grabbing, informative, and optimized for search
CourseEdit.imageDescription: Upload your course image here. Important guidelines: 750x422 pixels; .jpg, .jpeg, or .png.
